items.summary: Enhance the Valentine page with additional sweet, romantic animations beyond the current pulse/bounce effects, including a subtle ambient background animation (e.g., floating hearts/particles) that runs on both the question screen and the success screen.

Add smooth UI transitions to make state changes feel sweeter, including a more polished transition when switching from the question screen to the success screen after clicking the Yes button (e.g., fade/scale transition for the main card/content).

Add small micro-interactions that reinforce the romantic tone: improve hover/tap feedback on the Yes button (e.g., gentle shimmer/glow or soft bounce) and add a playful motion cue for the evasive No button (e.g., a short wiggle before/while it moves) without changing its evasive behavior.
